aboutMe: I am passionate about technology and the continuous development of my skills. I strive to improve every day, adapting to new tools and methodologies, always with the goal of creating efficient and functional solutions. I am excited about the opportunities ahead of me and ready to continue growing in the field of web development.
hobbies: I enjoy going to the gym to stay active and fit. I also love outdoor walks, especially in nature. I'm passionate about reading, exploring various topics to keep learning, and I'm a Marvel universe fanatic, enjoying its movies and series.

workExperience.title: Administrative
workExperience.company: Subsecretariat of the Family of the Municipality of the City of Corrientes
description: Internship (8 months) under the E.T.P program (Training for Public Work). Performance of administrative tasks: file loading and digitization, database loading, among others.

textContact: Are you looking for someone with skills and experience for a new project or position? I'm available for new opportunities and would love to hear about your proposal. If you think my profile fits what you need, feel free to get in touch with me. Please fill out the following form and I'll contact you as soon as possible.
